com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.qna

Class QNAManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dev.yvgenijsharovskij.n5kanjiandkanjistoryquiz.qna.QNAManager

  • public class QNAManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton manager class for the qna package. This class will exists as long as the application stays in memory.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yvgenij Sharovskij

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QNAManager(android.content.Context context)
      Private constructor, so that other classes will not be able to create a an instance of QNAManager.class and bypass the getInstance(Context) method.

      Initializes the quiz by setting up the quiz according to either one or a combination of these options:
        the default settings from QNASettings the user-selected settings the settings saved from the previous quiz
        Then, uses these settings to retrieve data from the db that is later used in the QNA_fragment.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QNAManager

        public QNAManager(android.content.Context context)
        Private constructor, so that other classes will not be able to create a an instance of QNAManager.class and bypass the getInstance(Context) method.
        Parameters:
        context - Context

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static QNAManager getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        If the instance already exists, then getInstance(Context) simply returns the instance. If the instance does not exist yet, then getInstance(Context) will call the constructor to create it.
        Uses lazy initialization, whereby the instance is created when the static method is first invoked. Declared with Draconian synchronization.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        instance of KanjiListManager

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes the quiz by setting up the quiz according to either one or a combination of these options:
        1. the default settings from QNASettings
        2. the user-selected settings
        3. the settings saved from the previous quiz

        Then, uses these settings to retrieve data from the db that is later used in the QNA_fragment.
        Parameters:
        context - Context

        3. the settings saved from the previous quiz

        public int getNumAnswersSelected()
        Gets the nr of the selected answers to start the quiz with according to:
        1. the default settings from QNASettings
        2. the user-selected settings
        3. the settings saved from the previous quiz

      • getRandomItems

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRandomItems(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list,
                                                                   int n)
        Returns a random number of elements from an ArrayList copy into a sublist which is cast as a new ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        list - the input list
        n - the upper limit of the returned sublist of the list parameter
        Returns:
        a shuffled sublist copy of the argument ArrayList list

      • getCombinedNumWrongAnswers

        public int getCombinedNumWrongAnswers()
        Gets the combined number of wrong answers based on the number of the combined selected answers and the number of the combined correct answers.
        The combined number here refers to both the current and the previous number of answers, where the latter is obtained from the previously saved quiz.
        Returns:
        the combined number of wrong answers

      • isStartingFromSavedState

        public boolean isStartingFromSavedState()
        Returns true if the user is starting the quiz by clicking the "Continue" button to start the quiz from the previously saved progress.
        Returns:
        true, if the user is starting the quiz by clicking the "Continue" button to start the quiz from the previously saved progress

      • setIsStartingFromSavedState

        public void setIsStartingFromSavedState(boolean isStartingFromSavedState)
        Sets if the user is starting the quiz by clicking the "Continue" button to start the quiz from the previously saved progress.
        Parameters:
        isStartingFromSavedState - sets if the user is starting the quiz by clicking the "Continue" button to start the quiz from the previously saved progress

      • isShowingSummaryFromQNADialog

        public boolean isShowingSummaryFromQNADialog()
        Returns true if the user selected to interrupt the quiz and start the QNASummary by clicking "Yes" in the QNAonExitDialog.
        Returns:
        true, if the user selected to interrupt the quiz and start the QNASummary by clicking "Yes" in the QNAonExitDialog

      • getRandomListItems

        public java.util.List<QNA> getRandomListItems(java.util.List<QNA> list,
                                              int n)
        Gets a random List sublist from a new shuffled copy of LinkedList<QNA>(list).
        Parameters:
        list - the QNA list
        n - the new sublist upper limit
        Returns:
        a new randomized QNA list
